--- tags: - core title: Popover description: >- Displays an overlay that can contain rich content and child components. --- import PopoverDemo from "./_components/PopoverDemo.vue";

The popover is the basis of a number of Core components including the Tooltip and Input Date components. Whilst similar to the tooltip, the Popover provides lower level control of the user experience in terms of triggering events and content layout. The popover will always try to position itself to appear visible to the user irrespective of it's configured position.
